appInfo.description: Experience the future of shoe shopping with our innovative mobile app designed for both customers and vendors.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To revolutionize the shoe shopping experience by connecting customers with premium footwear through innovative technology, exceptional service, and a seamless digital platform that brings together shoe enthusiasts and trusted vendors worldwide.

items.title: Smart Browse
items.description: Explore premium shoe collections with advanced filtering

items.title: Persistent Favorites
items.description: Save your favorite shoes with automatic cloud sync

items.title: Smart Cart
items.description: Shopping cart with local storage and size management

items.title: Real-time Tracking
items.description: Track your orders with live GPS integration

items.title: Theme Support
items.description: Beautiful dark and light themes with custom colors

items.title: Daily Inspiration
items.description: Motivational quotes powered by real-time API

items.title: Real-time Analytics
items.description: Live sales tracking and performance metrics

items.title: Inventory Control
items.description: Smart stock management with low inventory alerts

items.title: Customer Communication
items.description: Direct messaging and customer support tools

technologies.title: Built With Modern Technology
technologies.subtitle: Cutting-edge tech stack for optimal performance

company.name: Zaki Company
company.description: We are a technology company dedicated to creating innovative solutions that transform digital experiences. Our mission is to build products that connect people and businesses through cutting-edge mobile applications.

legal.privacyPolicy: We prioritize your privacy and data security with industry-standard encryption and compliance.
legal.termsOfService: Our terms ensure fair usage while protecting both users and vendors on our platform.
legal.openSource: Built with open-source technologies and community-driven development.
